Dialogue: I need to come clean. I want you to trust me. I want your friends to trust me.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: OK Quinn, just spit it out.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: OK  I want to spend that time with you.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Oh honey...

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Zoey? I...

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Shhh. You need me more than ever.

Speaker: dad
Dialogue: You're not even helping me!

Speaker: mom
Dialogue: I don't even know what you want!

Speaker: dad
Dialogue: I can't run my congregation with this sickness! MOM The sickness is in your head.

Speaker: dad
Dialogue: You're too busy running around doing whatever you feel like. I'm going to fall apart and it's all on you.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Last night?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Yes?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Did you?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Enjoy myself? Of course.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Based on how you are acting this morning I have my doubts. That's not what I meant though. You woke up screaming.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: It was nothing.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I understand if you don't want to talk about it. I'm just concerned.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: It's not a big deal. It was...a...well wouldn't call it a nightmare...repressed memory. Hell, it's not repressed...I think of it all the time.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: You don't want to hear about it.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Please?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: My father, I mentioned him before, was a Baptist minister. He always said he had this "sickness". He begged my mom for help, it was more important though for her to having shopping and dinner dates with her girlfriends. Anna, my friend that "loves you", has been in my life since I was tiny. She used to come over all the time. My Dad adored her. When I was around twelve I found something in the closet...tapes. My Dad and Anna from the time she was like seven...He...  I showed my Mom, and Dad...well he got out of prison when I was seventeen. I don't see him anymore. His church, even though they knew he had a problem disowned him. He wouldn't have done that to Anna if my mom would have supported him, got him help.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Who do you think is to blame?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: He tried to get help Quinn, he reached out to my Mom. I should have protected Anna too...I mean-

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: -None of this was your fault.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I have to protect people. This was out of my control, you Quinn...What's going on with you...I have control of that.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I love being with you.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Me too.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I can't renege on my responsibilities with Louis though. Zoey sits up.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: You're not actually going to fight your friend to the death are you?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I know you don't understand this. We just need to make the most of our time.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Quinn, in 2 days things are going to be normal. This is just a delusion.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I know you don't understand. I just need to go see Louis today.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I understand that.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What was wrong?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: My neighbor Ryan Blood...looks like he's spying on me.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What are you talking about?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I need to go see Louis.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: I thought him admitting his true self would break them up-

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: -Instead he is still hot and heavy with her.  He even did the "bipty boom" last night.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: The fight is pointless.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: It's not pointless. The game has just changed is all.  Honestly though that's an afterthought at this point-

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: So what's the next move?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Well when he does become engaged...

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: What are you doing?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I haven't heard from Quinn since he wigged out today.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Well honestly maybe that's a good thing.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: He needs me.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: He doesn't need you! Not everyone needs you!

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: This isn't about me and you-

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: -This is about me and you! You think you can make up for what happened. The fact you didn't notice, couldn't save me in time. You were a child! I was a child! You couldn't have saved your father either! Your mother couldn't have, no one could have! He was a fucking pedophile!

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Just show her the fucking file.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What fucking file?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: We have a problem.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: You're right. We do.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: I thought coming here would give us some privacy from Quinn.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: I think it worked out perfectly.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: So is the file folder for dramatic effect?

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: No it was to keep everything organized...  ...and for dramatic effect.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Quinn?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Ryan Blood!

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: You mentioned that earlier. What is going on?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: He's with Louis. They're planning to kill me.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I thought that was the whole plan.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: No it's...this isn't like Louis. I think he is trying to cheat his way to a win.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Why don't you come over here.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I can't!

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Come on Quinn get a grip. Just calm down and come over here.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: You're right.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: OK so just come on over and we'll talk.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: No I mean you're right. I need to get control of myself. I have a destiny. I need to figure out my next move.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Quinn? No wait-

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: What is it?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I don't know. He's losing it.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: You need to look at this.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: So what is all this?

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Quinn Wilson and Louis Marks were orphans.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: You're not telling me anything I didn't already know.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: That makes it worse. You're going to continue this now that you know for a fact that he is nuts?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I'm too far into this now. I don't have a choice.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Why don't you let us save you? Please Zoey.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Let me be guys.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Ehhh...what? You better be a hot bear of a man.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What's this?

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Looks like a room list from the psych hospital.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I gathered that. Under Quinn's room...

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Quinn and his roommate is listed.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Quinn's roommate was Ryan Blood?

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Yeah...looks that way.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Ah fuck.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: We need to talk.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: About? RYAN BLOOD Strategy.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Strategy?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Yes. I have a method-

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: -I have to hear this.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: A 12 point system-

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: - Like 12 steps?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Exactly. It's a sure fire plan to throw Quinn off of his game

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Oh I am so all ears.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Well the first thing you need is a battle cry.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Excuse me? A battle cry?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Yes a battle cry. Every great warrior has one.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: And a battle cry is going to give me the advantage in battle?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Of course it will. Why don't you try one out?

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Yeah, try one out right now. It's liberating.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: I'd rather not.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Come on.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Right here?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Here I'll go first-

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: That was...interesting.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: See?  Your turn.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: So right now?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Of course.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: We need to talk.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Excuse me for a second.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I know that guy and I don't trust him.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: I don't trust you anymore.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Your new friend is dangerous.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: So is yours.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Leave her out of this.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: You fighting tomorrow morning Quinn?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: It's over. This whole thing is nuts. I'm walking away.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Let me walk away from you first then.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Excuse me?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I'm looking for Mrs. Rhodes. I believe the people here referred to her as "mother".

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: People look for a lot of things.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I'm sure they do.  You guys shutting down?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: We are ceasing operations.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Is there something wrong with you?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What? I don't know what that means.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Um...no...listen do you know Quinn Wilson and Louis Marks? They grew up here.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Um...no.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What a fucking nut house!

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What!

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: I know the young boys you speak of.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: And?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: I was here when Quinn got sent to the mental hospital. It was like the other one set it up.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Wait Louis? You think Louis made Quinn appear crazy?

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: They both believed the same thing. Louis was just smart enough to hide it.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: There is more to it than that.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: I don't understand

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Listen "Robot Boy", where did this whole belief come from? This isn't something two kids come up with on their own.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: Yes I believe a seed was planted.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Exactly. I heard there was an employee that got fired for sharing Mormon mythology with the boys.

Speaker: jake
Dialogue: No. Off base. He's not the right one.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: You might be right sweetheart. The employee I was telling you about earlier was instrumental in getting Appleridge Orphanage shut down.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: How?

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Mrs. Rhodes was pretty well known in Huntington. I think she felt this guy was getting in the way of her master plan. Finally, nearly 20 years later, he convinced the state what was really going on there.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Well...elaborate.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: That girl you talked to was "pants crapping nuts". She actually makes your boyfriend look sane. I guess she believes that Lucifer came to her in a vision-

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: -How is that different than a dream? Just saying-

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: -I don't know. I think you have to be awake for a vision.  Will you please pay attention? Anyway he, meaning Lucifer, gave her this jazz about...well you know the story. Two angels, fighting to the death...blah...blah...Anyway he told her she needed to look after Louis and get Quinn out of there. I guess trying to stack the odds in Louis' favor.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: So she had Quinn committed? JACK To the same hospital where her nephew was a patient. All on the dark lord's orders I guess.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Fucking Ryan Blood!

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Your friends are fucking whack.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Thanks Jack.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: So what are you going to do?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I'm going to stop an Apocalyptic battle.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Goddamn Zoey!

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: So where is she at now?

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: I got a text about thirty minutes ago. I'm pretty sure she is going to head to Quinn's apartment.

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Jack... JACK What?

Speaker: anna
Dialogue: Her Christ Complex is going to get her killed.

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Trust me I know Anna.  I know...

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Good afternoon boys and girls! I need your assistance.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: How do people keep ending up in my room?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: You need to learn to lock up.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I'm not fighting Louis.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Why the change of heart?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I think you might be right. I don't think it's necessary. I think the world will keep turning one way or another. I'm not dependant on that.  I'm not a savior.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Do you really believe? You know?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Yes. I do believe it. I know it actually. Since I have been with you, I've doubted what I know to be fact though. Then it hit me, it really doesn't matter.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I'll help you Quinn. I don't want to do it for myself...

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: You're not selfish Zoey.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I care about you Quinn. That's sincerely my reason for wanting to do this. That's a first for me you know?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I know...

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Let her go!

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Let me pretty the girl up a bit

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Hold on sunshine!

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Mother fucker!

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Where's Zoey?

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Fuck you mother fucker! I'm going to call the fucking fuzz once you untie me! Fucking nut bag, ball sac-

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I...will...come...rescue...you

Speaker: jack
Dialogue: Ass fuck salad-

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: That actually felt kind of good.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I'm not doing it anymore. You will not have redemption from me.

Speaker: dad
Dialogue: Zoey...

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Take ownership of what you did. Don't rely on me to save you. I need to start saving myself.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: What do you think Zoey? I'm a ninja!

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: You're fucking crazy!

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: That's not nice! I think I look good.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I think you're a fucking nut bag.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: This is going to be fun. You'll see.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Mrs Rhodes? Does that name ring a bell?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: My aunt?

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Yeah...yeah...she played a part in the game. Tell us something we don't know. You're such a sexy Nancy Drew right now.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Go fuck yourself.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Or a foul mouthed Velma. That gets me so hard. Does that get you hard Ryan?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Can we go back to my aunt please?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Mrs. Rhodes? What about her? Other than she fucked you guys up. She taught you, Louis how to play it straight. Then she has you fuck Quinn over. RYAN BLOOD She didn't fuck Quinn over. She just helped him out.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Yeah by getting him in contact with you.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: She knew one day it was all going to catch up with her. She trained me to get into the game. She told me it was my destiny.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Is that why she placed you in that hospital?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: She was my caretaker. She told me she was sending me someone. Someone I would have to guide on to the right path.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Guys I have let my parents fuck me up. There comes a time though where you have to go out on your own. Take responsibility for your own life.

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: There is a much bigger purpose. You'll see.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: This whole thing was to carry out some delusional woman's master plan. She doesn't even remember who she is at this point. I went to see her...she wanted me to take off my shirt.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Will you shut up?!? You are ruining my climatic fight.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Let her go!

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: Not yet...

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Is this the game you want to play?

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: I'm not going to lose this time.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I thought you didn't believe this shit anymore.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: There's more going on than you realize Zoey.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: This is fucked. Quinn you're not 5000 years old. You were born in an orphanage. None of this makes sense.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Lady, it would look weird if we roamed the earth for 5000 years without facing a mortal death! We keep getting reborn, sometimes we even switch physical form. Thanks for coming to the game late missy!

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: That makes total fucking sense. Color me stupid!

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: You don't get it do you. LOUIS What?!?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: If you win...you're not becoming the antichrist.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: What are you talking about??

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: It's   Ryan...it's always been Ryan.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: What is he talking about?

Speaker: ryan blood
Dialogue: He's pitting us against each other.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I'm going to be honest with you Louis. I've always been honest.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Yeah sometimes to a fault.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: We have always played this game as honest as we could. We never did anything to undermine the other. Despite what you represent, you have moral code.  You are not acting with in that code today.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: I'm tired of losing...

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: You're losing right now. Your actions, you can't win like this. Not acting this way.

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: I'm tired of you. I'm going to end it!

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: It's the endgame.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: What the fuck!

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Zoey go home. We need to finish this.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: No you don't. Guys what are you doing?

Speaker: louis
Dialogue: Go home girl!

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Are you being serious?

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: I will always love you. You have to go though.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: If you don't walk away from this field right now, you will lose me. I will not be in your corner. I will call for help. They will stop you.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Go...

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Quinn...last chance. Zoey walks over to Ryan's body. She searches till she finds her cell phone in his front pocket.

Speaker: quinn
Dialogue: Goodbye.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Wow...yeah goodbye.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Goodbye boys...

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: For years we have thought absence of the impossible indicated that we were exercising free thought. In my experience ladies and gentleman, that's not the case.  Believing in hope my friends, opening yourself up to accepting there might be more than the world around you. That's truly being a free thinker.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Hey Grandma.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Hey...

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: You look solemn. ZOEY Just sitting here...thinking...

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What are you thinking about?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I've had a great life. A wonderful husband, children, grandchildren...  ...great grandchildren...I spent so much of my youth being angry. I wish I could relive my life now, knowing what I know.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: You do have a lot of wisdom.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I've tried to pass it on to you.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: You've taught me a lot.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Just remember, you can believe what you want to believe Jennifer. Live by what ever moral code you want to live by. Just make sure it's yours. Don't let it stem from anger or past tragedies.  Let it come from your heart.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: My new boyfriend. The one I wanted you to meet.

Speaker: boyfriend
Dialogue: Nice to meet to ma'am.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Likewise.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: We better get going. We're going to grab something to eat.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: I didn't catch your name.

Speaker: boyfriend
Dialogue: I'm so sorry. I'm being rude.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: He can be like that.

Speaker: boyfriend
Dialogue: I'm Louis.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: You OK?

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Yeah I'm fine.  Enjoy dinner.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: See you later on.

Speaker: boyfriend
Dialogue: Nice to meet you.

Speaker: zoey
Dialogue: Likewise.
